mapper.select: SELECT u.name, u.photo, d.dept_name AS deptName, ck.address, CASE WHEN ck.status = 1 THEN '正常' WHEN ck.status = 2 THEN '迟到' END AS status, CASE WHEN ck.risk=1 THEN '低风险' WHEN ck.risk=2 THEN '中风险' WHEN ck.risk=3 THEN '高风险' END AS risk, DATE_FORMAT(ck.create_time,'%H:%i') AS checkinTime, ck.date FROM tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_dept AS d ON u.dept_id = d.id LEFT JOIN tb_checkin AS ck on u.id = ck.user_id AND ck.date = CURRENT_DATE WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.status = 1
